cpt_description: Emergency Dept Visit - Level 5 (High Severity / Life Threatening)
recorded_clinical_notes: Patient presented with twisted right ankle from football. Conscious, alert. Vitals completely stable: BP 110/75, HR 68 bpm. Pain level 4/10. Sent for X-ray.
Radiology: X-Ray Right Ankle (AP and Lateral). Finding: Bone alignment normal. No acute fracture. Soft tissue swelling consistent with sprain.
NO RECORD FOUND. Note explicitly states: 'No further imaging required.'
Diagnosis: Grade 1 Ankle Sprain. Advised RICE protocol. Ankle brace fitted. Prescribed Tab. Ibuprofen 400mg BD for 5 days. Discharged.
